title: T200 Fatima FS Pit-Wagner, Cin, Bos AM
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: T200 Fatima FS Pit-Wagner, Cin, Bos AM
posts.post_content:
Offered here are 3 ungraded 1913 T200 Fatima Team Cards. 
The Pittsburgh Card has a very nice dark image on the front with good contrast and clarity. Wagner's image is unobstructed . There is a slight crease which is more of a photo crack through Hendrix next to Wagner which does not go through to the back. The back has some black staining which is also present on the front border. I am not sure how this would grade. Possibly an A because of the staining or maybe higher. I can only say it is authentic.

The Cincinnati card with Joe Tinker has a great front with no visible creases I can see with excellent contrast and clarity. On the back there is a small piece of paper loss in the bottom border likely from album removal and a second small piece of paper loss over the word name

The Boston AL card is quite nice with a crisp and clean image with great clarity. There is a crease next to Carrigan top to bottom which is apparent on the back as well It does not touch Joe Wood or Tris Speaker in this nice example . The back is mostly clean.

All 3 are authentic Fatima T200 cards. I cannot say they will grade higher than authentic although I have no way to know how a TPG would judge these three. Thanks for looking

Pittsburgh $sold
Boston AL $sold
Cin           $sold

Please add 8.00 for shipping in a flat rate box. Paypal f & f preferred
solid prices. If I didn't have so much tied up in grading I'd be all over them.

Hey Rick,

I will buy the pirate team card.
Cin 249.00. On ebay now . May be the last chance to snag it
